About the Company: Fortune Financial Services (India) Ltd. is listed on the Bombay Stock Exchange Ltd and is SEBI registered Category I Merchant Banker. It has recently got approval from SEBI to launch its Portfolio Management Services (PMS). FFSIL is engaged in providing a range of Financial Services right from Equities and Derivatives trading, Equity Research, Commodities Trading, Portfolio Management Services, Distribution of Mutual Funds, IPO & Insurance products and also Investment banking services.
